Verses: 1 karththaave, Ummai Nambiyirukkiren; Naan Orukkaalum Vetkamadaiyaadhabadi Seyyum; Umadhu Needhiyinimiththam Ennai Viduviyum.
2 umadhu Seviyai Enakkuch Saaiththu, Seekkiramaai Ennaith Thappuviyum; Neer Enakkup Balaththa Thurugamum, Enakku Adaikkalamaana Aranumaayirum.
3 en Kanmalaiyum En Kottaiyum Neere; Umadhu Naamaththinimiththam Enakku Vazhikaatti, Ennai Nadaththiyarulum.
4 avargal Enakku Maraivaai Vaiththa Valaikku Ennai Neengalaakkividum; Dhevareere Enakku Aran.
5 umadhu Kaiyil En Aaviyai Oppuvikkiren; Saththiyabaranaagiya Karththaave, Neer Ennai Meettukkondeer.
6 veenmaayaigalaip Patrikkollugiravargalai Naan Veruththu, Karththaraiye Nambiyirukkiren.
7 umadhu Kirubaiyile Kalikoorndhu Magizhuven; Neer En Ubaththiravaththaip Paarththu, En Aaththuma Viyaagulangalai Arindhirukkireer.
8 saththuruvin Kaiyil Ennai Oppukkodaamal, En Paadhangalai Visaalaththile Niruththineer.
9 enakku Irangum Karththaave, Naan Nerukkappadugiren; Dhukkaththinaal En Kannum En Aaththumaavum En Vayirungoodak Karugippoyitru.
10 en Piraanan Sanjalaththinaalum, En Varushangal Thavippinaalum Kazhindhupoyitru; En Akkiramaththinaale En Belan Kuraindhu, En Elumbugal Ularndhupoyitru.
11 en Saththurukkalaagiya Yaavar Nimiththamum, Naan En Ayalaarukku Nindhaiyum, Enakku Arimugamaanavargalukku Arukkalippumaanen; Veedhiyile Ennaik Kandavargal Enakku Vilagi Odipponaargal.
12 seththavanaippola Ellaaraalum Muzhuvadhum Marakkappatten; Udaindha Paaththiraththaip Polaanen.
13 anegar Sollum Avadhooraik Ketten; Enakku Virodhamaaga Avargal Egamaai Aalosanaipannugiradhinaal Thigil Ennaich Soozhndhukondadhu; En Piraananai Vaangaththedugiraargal.
14 naano Karththaave, Ummai Nambiyirukkiren; Neere En Dhevan Endru Sonnen.
15 en Kaalangal Umadhu Karaththilirukkiradhu; En Saththurukkalin Kaikkum Ennaith Thunbappaduththugiravargalin Kaikkum Ennaith Thappuviyum.
16 neer Umadhu Mugaththai Umadhu Oozhiyakkaaranmel Piragaasikkappanni, Umadhu Kirubaiyinaale Ennai Ratchiyum.
17 karththaave, Ummai Nokkik Kooppitten; Naan Vetkappattuppogaadhapadi Seyyum; Thunmaarkkar Vetkappattup Paadhaalaththil Mavunamaayirukkattum.
18 needhimaanukku Virodhamaaip Perumaiyotum Igazhchchiyodum Kadinamaaip Pesugira Poi Udhadugal Kattappattuppovadhaaga.
19 umakkup Bayandhavargalukkum, Manupuththirarukku Munbaaga Ummai Nambugiravargalukkum, Neer Undupannivaiththirukkira Ummudaiya Nanmai Evvalavu Peridhaayirukkiradhu!
20 manusharudaiya Agangaaraththukku Avargalai Umadhu Samugaththin Maraivile Maraiththu, Naavugalin Sandaikku Avargalai Vilakki, Umadhu Koodaaraththile Oliththuvaiththuk Kaappaatrugireer.
21 karththar Aranaana Nagaraththil Enakkuth Thamadhu Kirubaiyai Adhisayamaai Vilangappanninapadiyaal, Avarukku Sthoththiram.
22 ummudaiya Kangalukku Munbaaga Iraadhabadikku Vettunden Endru Naan En Manakkalakkaththile Sonnen; Aanaalum Naan Ummainokkik Kooppittabodhu, En Vinnappangalin Saththaththaik Ketteer.
23 karththarudaiya Parisuththavaangale, Neengalellaarum Avaril Anbukoorungal; Unmaiyaanavanaik Karththar Tharkaaththu, Idumpuseygiravanukkup Pooranamaaip Badhilalippaar.
24 karththarukkuk Kaaththirukkiravargale, Neengalellaarum Thidamanadhaayirungal, Avar Ungal Irudhayaththai Sthirappaduththuvaar.
